boardgame.description: Slide, COLLIDE and SCORE TO WIN!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Grab your roller pawn and take aim - then skillfully slide it down your track onto the target board! A good slide could score big points, but watch out! An opponent's pawn may slam your pawn onto a Sorry! space - and out of the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is a new twist on the Sorry! franchise with 4 different ways to play:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Race For Home_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Instant Home_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Instant Sorry!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Danger Dots_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;For Ages 6 and up_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Sorry! Sliders Parker Brothers 2008 Complete. Everything but the Spanish rule sheet is in excellent condition. Includes rules in English and Spanish (the Spanish rules have seen better days, but the English rules are in fine shape); two target boards; 4 tracks with side rails; 4 blocker rails (rules say 3, but I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve got 4); 16 large rollers pawns (4 in each of 4 colors); 16 small scoring pawns (4 in each of 4 colors); 4 score boards. Box has wear but is structurally sound. (14)

Item Name: Sorry Sliders Description: Used, complete. Shipping Weight: 4 lbs Orders are usually shipped within one business day of receiving payment. Shipping can be calculated by adding the weights of all games purchased together (yes, we do combine items for shipping so take a look at our other games as the cost of shipping that second or third game is small compared to the first one) and adding 1 pound for packaging materials from US zip code 60134. We ship via either the USPS or UPS.
